name: Mount Everest
description: Mount eve is the highest mountain in the world. The summit was named after Eve, the patroness of life.

name: Mount kilimanjaro
description: Mount kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in Africa. The summit was named after Kilimanjaro, the Great Grandfather of the earth.

name: Mount fuji
description: Mount fuji is the highest mountain in Japan. The summit was named after Fuji, the Japanese god of water.

name: Mount k2
description: Mount k2 is the highest mountain in the world. The summit was named after K2, the second moon of Jupiter.
